Title: Secure Lock Down
Description: SecureLockDown is a product that incorporates a "Kiosk" style interface which will lock down a machine via hardware and software. The product will also have a proxy in it as well.  Developed in VB and C++.  This will help people who want to lock down their machines.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SecureLockDown is a product that incorporates a "Kiosk" style interface which will lock down a machine via hardware and software. The product will also have a proxy in it as well. Developed in VB and C++. This will help people who want to lock down their machines.

This is not a fully functioning copy at this time. Team Members need access to code.Fully Functional Excpeted release date 9/16/2011.
